name: Binding Mage
description:
Submitted for Game Makers Tool Kit 2021 Game Jam

Defeat robots to level up and gain allies that follow you. The more allies you have joined to you, the better chance you have at surviving the hordes. Survive twenty seconds after reaching the hardest difficulty to win.

WASD - Move around

Mouse - Look around

Left Click - Shoot

EthanBaedke - Programmer

Frostburn Spirit - Character and Enemy Art

Beonlytom - Musician

N9snake - World Art
